mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proofComment(proofCommentId, proofNo, proofComment, commentDate, author, challId) VALUES (PROOFCOMMENT_SEQ.nextval,#{proofNo},#{proofComment},SYSDATE,#{author},#{challId})
mapper.update: UPDATE PROOFCOMMENT SET PROOFCOMMENT=#{proofComment} WHERE PROOFCOMMENTID=#{proofCommentId}
